name: Wedgie Simulator
description:
Welcome to Wedgie Simulator!
A sandbox game about giving your mannequin a wedgie.

  • 6 scenes to choose from.
  • 16 characters; 8 templates, 8 samples.
  • Create new characters with plenty of customization features.
  • Really fun and quirky wedgie physics!
  • Animate your scenes and pose your characters.
  • Screenshot or record your scenes.
  • Variety of music to choose from.
  • COMING SOON: Mod support!

__________

DEMO VERSION:

  • 3 scenes to choose from.
  • 16 characters; 8 templates, 8 samples.
  • Really fun and quirky wedgie physics!
  • Animate your scenes and pose your characters.
  • Screenshot your scenes.
  • Variety of music to choose from.

Go nuts!
